The Fedayeen got their start in the mid-1990's. This militia group loyal to Sadam Hussein were started by Saddam's son Ouday. Part of their tradition is to tear a dog in half and sink into the dog's internal organs with their teeth. Likened to the German S.S. they employ terrorism inside their own state to maintain the fear of the citizenry. I hope we kill every last one of that inhuman bunch of deviants. Anyone that uncivilized automatically relinquishing their right to inhabit the earth, and should be destroyed like a mad dog on the street.
